articles.description: Feb. 22 is National Margarita Day or Margarita Monday. But the made-up day is different amid the COVID pandemic. Chili's has several margarita deals.
articles.content:
You don't have to wait until 5 o'clock to kick off National Margarita Day.
Wochit
National Margarita Day also is Margarita Monday this year.
But the spirited made-up holiday will look different th… [+4979 chars]
